org.harctoolbox.devslashlirc

Interface ILircCode

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LircCodeLircDevice

    public interface ILircCode
    This interface models a "LircCode" Lirc hardware, device or driver.

    • Method Summary

      int read()
      Read a code.
